description: Navigate a hazardous cave to collect diamonds while avoiding falling rocks.
rationale: This game focuses on spatial reasoning and gravity-based physics puzzles. It targets players who enjoy retro arcade logic games and provides an excellent environment for RL agents to learn pathfinding under environmental constraints.
details: The game consists of a 2D grid filled with dirt, rocks, and diamonds. The player (the digger) moves through the grid, removing dirt to create paths. Rules: 1. Gravity affects rocks and diamonds; they fall if there is empty space or a rounded object below them. 2. A falling rock will crush the player, ending the game. 3. Players can push rocks horizontally if there is empty space behind the rock. 4. Collecting a specific number of diamonds opens the exit door. 5. Enemies move in predictable patterns and must be avoided or crushed by falling rocks for extra points.
how_to_build: uv venv && uv pip install pygame
how_to_stop: Press 'ESC' or close the window. For CLI termination, use Ctrl+C.
how_to_play: Goal: Collect all diamonds and reach the exit. Controls: Use Arrow Keys to move the player. Scoring: +10 points per diamond, +50 points for reaching the exit. Game Over: Player is hit by a rock or enemy. RL Strategy: Maximize reward by finding the shortest path to diamonds while predicting rock fall trajectories.
